    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="63969" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="63969" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.06</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="725">725</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="80"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>The Inimitable William Penhaligon</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. <b>The Inimitable William Penhaligon</b> was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Bergamot and Jasmine; middle notes are Vetiver, Cedar and Incense; base notes are Sandalwood and Ambroxan. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>When MrPenhaligonfirst made cologne (for royals and nobility,) he had set upin Mayfair, (the centre of Old-World civility).Our Dear Queen Victoria, and theShah of Persia soon wore his scent, and the request for a Royal Warrant hadswift regal consent. This was 1870, and the world was discovering what wouldone day be his legacy. </p>

<p>The above is all true.</p>

<p>Majestic and chic. Like a good friend, stimulating and comforting in equalmeasure. Like great art and music, uplifting. Composed in expert, meticulousdetail, but with strong, confident brush strokes - WilliamPenhaligos ownscent. </p>

<p>Beyond distinguished. A timeless classic, since 2020. Created with Vetiver, oneof perfumery s master ingredients. Earthy, warm and fresh. Woven inside anOriental structure, one of perfumery s mistresses of sophistication.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other                     </div>
                    </div>
                    Has notes that some individuals may want to avoid
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    </div>
                    Barely noticeable bergamot and cedar notes
                </div>

</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="63969"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.20</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="63969"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.08</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2364487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Venusmatteri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2340613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Venusmatteri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2340613">Venusmatteri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is beautiful, and I felt like it pulled very dark green but feminine on me. However the dry down was more masculine, so I gave it to my father, who suits masculine scents with a bit of sweetness. Heartbroken to have to part with it, but I love the smell on him even more. Like walking through a dense pine tree forest with a basket of spices and wildflowers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2364487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2364487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335257" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 00:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As with almost all of the portraits collection this is a very classic type of fragrance that has been refined for modern times. I can picture this being the type of fragrance I would smell from a very classy type of older gentleman. I don't want to say that it smells like old man but it does give a bit of that vibe. It's super smooth and refined..like someone else said it takes what would have been the harshest notes and smoothes out the edges. Nothing comes off sharp it's all a very smooth creamy gust of air. Very classy . I would find it very hard for someone under 35 that has Versace Eros in their top 5 liking this . It keeps the portraits theme of classic old school scents that are refined and modernized. The performance does lack a bit though. At first spray you can get some of the citrus and jasmine but that fades away so fast. Like within 10 minutes. But after that everything else takes over. The vetiver the ambroxan the woods the incense. It all mixes to make a smooth under the radar gentleman smell. Woody , slightly smokey with the sandalwood creamy sweetness. It doesn't project well but it does stick to the skin for awhile. It is definitely an intimate fragrance . I got a good 4 hours before it disappeared. That's with 2 sprays per spot. For the price of these fragrances I would expect a lot more. What I do like is that the dry down comes fast so after a few minutes that what's you get for the remainder of the life of the fragrance. <br />
Overall it's a good fragrance. It's very mature without giving old man or dad vibes. It smells very high end and unique. Versatility may not be the greatest. I wouldn't wear this with casual clothing but it can be pulled off with many outfits . Performance does blow. I give this a solid 6/10. Slightly above average. Better performance and just some zing somehow would have elevated this for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2335257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2335257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328579" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2327764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2327764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324529" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324529ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324529" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 23:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can say that it is the only good men's fragrance that I found by trying, which can be bought from this brand. The smell is exactly a father smell, a reassuring and supportive father. Woody but in a soft tone. I liked it very much. The opening is citrusy but not the stay. The stay is a very classy and elegant wood. I'm probably picking up the santal note, a nice creamy santal. <br />
<br />
I am going to buy a bottle for my husband as a gift for being such a loving and caring father.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2324529"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2324529#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2297254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2297254" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tylerg822"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1915564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1915564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tylerg822" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2297254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2297254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1915564">tylerg822</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 14:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This brand truly has a hard time with performance. Its nearly every fragrance ive tried from Penhaligons its almost as if theyre allergic to making longer lasting fragrances. Nice pleasing daily fragrance suitable for work. Classy, but like i said, relatively poor performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2297254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2297254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284229" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 22:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ultra smooth vetiver, sandalwood, and cedarwood fragrance. There's a polish to this that makes it feel very refined, with all the rough edges of the vetiver and woods sanded down. I've been testing throughout the day and sometimes it seems veriver dominant, and other sprays it seems more wood dominant. There's a common creamy note or accord here that Alberto also uses in Blazing Sam and Balm of calm. Here it's more nutty, in Sam it's more balmy, almost like shea butter, and in Balm of Calm it's shea and coconut. <br />
<br />
My buddy who is not a vetiver lover, wears and enjoys this one. It seems to be extremely versatile and could be worn casual or formal, in just about any weather. I wore it in the heat without issue. <br />
This might be the perfect introductory vetiver for someone to get acquainted with this material. There's a creamy aspect thay has wide appeal, but I think the vetiver here makes it more suitable for those looking for a masculine vibe. Slightly reminds me of Boadicea Green Sapphire but less oily and missing the violet and a few other things. It's also in the same vicinity but not exactly like Amouage Meander. Late stage drydown reminds me of Floris Santal. don't see how anyone could dislike this one<br />
---------------------------------------------------------<br />
Scent 85/100<br />
Performance TBD</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2284229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2284229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275991" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Demani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Demani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156">Demani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nutty vetiver opening with jasmine and ambroxane <br />
Base notes are just woody<br />
That's it, vetiver and woody <br />
Not very inimitable if u ask me </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2275991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2275991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255986" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 03:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is fitting that Penhaligon's include an ode to their founder, William Penhaligon, among their Portraits. However, where I expected a classic cologne in an old-world style, I got a fairly generic modern masculine, a woody-amber with some spice. While decent, it leaves me underwhelmed.<br />
<br />
The Inimitable William Penhaligon is a woody-amber scent, discreet and with mass appeal. It opens with bright bergamot, with vetiver following closely, forming the backbone of this scent. Dry and woody, with its distinctive grassiness, the vetiver is good quality and not bitter. The cinnamon follows, adding some warm, sweet spice. It is muted, melding nicely with the vetiver.<br />
<br />
As it develops, it becomes an ambroxan scent, its synthetic creamy musk rounding out the base. I think ambroxan is actually a great synthetic amber-esque molecule, but it feels generic here, even lazy.  There is a slight balsamic nuance as it dries down thanks to the incense. The dry woody notes linger as it fades to an ambroxan skin scent. Sillage and longevity are moderate. It is a masculine-leaning transeasonal daytime scent.<br />
<br />
Safe and bland, there is little to set this scent apart from the crowd. It is also overpriced for what it is. William Penhaligon may have been Inimitable, but the same cannot be said for his namesake fragrance. 2.5/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2255986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2255986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159953" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amir.Fr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653531"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1653531.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amir.Fr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653531">Amir.Fr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 07:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>             <br />
        </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2159953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2159953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156567" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostnose2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostnose2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834">lostnose2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful and dapper fragrance.  Comforting, for sure. I like it but with small projection and high price, it gives me pause to love it. Change those, and you have a winner. Penhaligon's offers many great fragrances. I really enjoy Halfeti. The portraits collection has many great offerings.  This is one of the best from that collection in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2156567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2156567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SamuAoud"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2106884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2106884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SamuAoud" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2106884">SamuAoud</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 04:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My Dearest William Penhaligon,<br />
<br />
As I sit here, enveloped in the captivating essence that is your namesake fragrance, I am compelled to express the depths of my adoration for you. From the very moment our paths intertwined, I knew there was something truly extraordinary about you, something that would linger in the air long after you departed.<br />
<br />
Oh, William Penhaligon, how do I begin to describe the symphony of sensations you evoke? Your top notes, like a joyous overture, dance upon my senses with the effervescent freshness of bergamot and juniper, igniting a spark of exhilaration within me. As I delve deeper, I am enraptured by the tender embrace of lavender and geranium, their floral melodies weaving a tapestry of romance around my very being.<br />
<br />
But it is your heart, dear William, that truly steals my breath away. Here, nestled amidst the fragrant petals, lies the soul-stirring warmth of cinnamon and cloves, a passionate embrace that speaks of timeless devotion. And oh, how my heart quickens at the mere thought of your base notes, where the sultry allure of amber and patchouli entwine in an intoxicating embrace, leaving an indelible imprint upon my soul.<br />
<br />
With each delicate spritz of your essence, I am transported to a realm where time stands still, where every moment is infused with the ineffable magic of our connection. You are not merely a fragrance, my dear William; you are a whispered promise of enchantment, a lingering caress that lingers upon my skin like a tender kiss.<br />
<br />
In your presence, I am bewitched, entranced by the sheer depth of your complexity, your imitable charm that sets my heart aflutter. So, let me linger in your embrace a while longer, my dearest William Penhaligon, for in your fragrance, I have found a love that transcends the boundaries of time and space.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2133528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2133528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127285" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/987227">Kinggeebee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 06:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth, inviting, elegant.<br />
<br />
Well blended, I dont discern any of the notes besides the vetiver and some woodiness, with fressness lingering throughout <br />
<br />
Very good performance of my skin<br />
<br />
Love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2127285"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2127285#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Szewi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Szewi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066196">Szewi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 03:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolute amazing fragrance for winter and autumn, vetiver/sandal is the main character but the magic resides in the surrounding notes that make some sort of beautiful chord. That's the inimitable part. You can find fragrances with the same base notes, you can try the clone of it for 30 bucks, but it will be a massive loss of time. Fully recommend, only down side it's the longevity, for that price tag and bottle I expect a lil bit more performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2099216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2099216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976881">bamba21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-05">03/05/24 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like a rich british king</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082779" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hojubaby"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hojubaby" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Tilia-91688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tilia"title="Tilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082779ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082779" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633">Hojubaby</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-05">03/05/24 04:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This, in my opinion, is the best Penhaligon's from the trade routes and portraits discovery sets ive tried, absolutely very well blended and extremely addictive, i just cant stop smelling it. <br />
I think women can pull this off eventhough its a bit more masculine leaning, its got a very strong character and just radiates luxury<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2082779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2082779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078220" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cjseeyasmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cjseeyasmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038692">Cjseeyasmell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 14:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overpriced, but smells great. Wish it lasted longer on my skin. Bottle is luxurious and so are the stories behind the bottles</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2078220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2078220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073278" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Douggie T-Ray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1907000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Douggie T-Ray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907000">Douggie T-Ray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 23:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this smells like a much richer and nicer version of Ralph Lauren Polo Red, but without the awful synthetic leather note. I particularly notice some similar red berry notes which are persistent throughout the development of the scent. Its a very nicely blended scent that if worn in moderation lasts for a good 4 hours and gives a fairly close but not intimate silage. People around you will definitely notice a subtle, classy scent, but it wont bang them over the head. The incense note is like a panther skulking about in the background and occasionally appearing to add some mystery. A very safe office scent for the cooler months, or even into spring and cooler summer days, however do not overspray or it becomes overly sweet and cloying. I prefer some of the other Penhaligons portraits, like Terrible Teddy, or Tragedy of Lord George, but this is definitely wearable and suits an everyday scent if you like this sort of thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2073278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2073278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003">xvxmatthewxvx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 23:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The sandalwood &amp; cedar in this is coconut flavored &amp; the vetiver is nutty like marzipan. Dry down is hazy musky woods &amp; ambroxan. Not my style but good quality &amp; performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2067805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2067805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052604" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="faris_fauzee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1748293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="faris_fauzee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052604ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052604" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748293">faris_fauzee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 03:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>did anybody here get the similarity with Bvglari Terrae Essence? this smell quite similar to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2052604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2052604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015813" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 22:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hi William.<br />
The final fragrance of my portraits library, which is very fitting because this feels like the epitome of the Penhaligon's DNA.<br />
The classic Penhaligon's pepper-y botanical old english musk is of course present.<br />
<br />
Sandalwood and vetiver are on full display here. An initial layer of tart bitterness from the bergamot contrasts with the sweet woodiness nicely.<br />
Some amber and incense give William some cosy warmth.<br />
And airy jasmine and maybe some dry violet keep it from being too heavy.<br />
<br />
It's definitely a very pleasant, intricately blended fragrance. But absolutely not inimitable. Strikingly similar to Portrayal Man by Amouage.<br />
<br />
This is for a very dapper gentleman.<br />
Performance is nothing to write home about.<br />
<br />
VERDICT:<br />
William is the namesake and epitome of Penhaligon's. Interesting, pleasant and handsome.<br />
Yet somehow I don't feel satisfied, like he's missing a 'star of the show' note. It feels like his notes are contextual, making way for something outstanding, but that x-factor seems to be m.i.a.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2015813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2015813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009293" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Theodorapo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/929673"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.929673.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Theodorapo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Eau-de-Parfum-71606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"title="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/929673">Theodorapo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-23">12/23/23 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its not that much of a review but more a suggestion! This one is very similar to amouage meander and for the price they both have it is worth it more to go for Amouage! Better projection and longevity in my opinion where u get the orris powdery vibe more prominent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="2009293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=2009293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977836" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Damu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Damu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224416">Damu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 05:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is like a more masculine version of Floraiku One Umbrella for Two. I swear I can smell black currant in here, and even if it isn't exactly black currant, this perfume smells way fruitier than the note list would lead one to believe. Very, very pleasant and totally unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1977836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1977836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960567" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="taruxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458181"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1458181.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="taruxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Qaed-Al-Fursan-67996.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67996.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Qaed Al Fursan"title="Qaed Al Fursan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458181">taruxx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-25">10/25/23 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really unique smell, very good, for me it's very well blended, very unique, can't compare it to anything. Just try it. Don't let people's comments alter your buying decision, fragrance is very subjective. Just try it, if you love, you love, if you don't, at least you have tried it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1960567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1960567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598">cpsottak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-24">10/24/23 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth clean white floral reminiscent if something like amouage reflection man, i reckon if you like that fragrance youll like this.<br />
<br />
This fragrance smells great in the air, and maybe not as good close up on skin or paper. In the air it smells very smooth and clean and sophisticated. Unique and very regal in Penhaligons style.<br />
<br />
Signature scent worthy, i think this could work all year. It leans a little formal, a little autumnal, but still versatile with the right style</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1960107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1960107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463">AhmedElbahja95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know where to begin with this review. I've gone through half of the bottle and I still don't know what I think of this fragrance. I'm constantly unsure about William Penhaligon. Sometimes I like it, sometimes I don't like it. Never do I love it, never do I hate it. I feel completely indifferent about this fragrance. Try it on your skin before purchasing and let it dry down. I personally think it lacks longevity but it's an OK performer. I think there are MUCH better Penhaligon's perfumes. I get a strong earthy, grassy smell from this fragrance. It's because of the vetiver. I give this fragrance 6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1908487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1908487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Too powdery despite the powder is mild; they couldve just left it out of the formula. Airy. Refined. Sophisticated. Masculine. Subtle. Balanced. Definitively Penhalons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1869511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1869511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869237" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mdk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756484.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mdk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-des-Sens-Eau-de-Toilette-35678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"title="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484">Mdk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-01">07/01/23 23:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the sense that it carries the name and history of the brand, I thought that this would be a perfume with their prestige at stake.<br />
Hmm, but in the end, it smells like banal and mediocre, like most of this portrait collection.<br />
I dare say this is a slightly more mature George scent. Woody and antique. If this had been marketed as a Load George scent, I might have agreed with the naming.<br />
<br />
I think Penhaligon's promotional methods are wonderful. The story, the design, and the various ways it expands the imagination of the scent, makes a nice bottle, and even the exorbitant price is one added value.<br />
But what I'm looking for is a nice fragrance that has them...<br />
I'm glad I started with the Discovery Set from the Portrait Collection. I'm ready to say goodbye to this house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1869237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1869237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1854980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1854980" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feuermaiden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feuermaiden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boy-Smells/Woodphoria-75837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woodphoria"title="Woodphoria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1854980ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1854980" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-12">06/12/23 19:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So nice - this is unisex and leans masculine but as a woman, I would not mind smelling like this all day. <br />
<br />
The opening is very peppery and citrusy and dries down to a lush incense scent on the skin. Vetiver and sandalwood round it out to create a warm, inviting, and all around sophisticated fragrance. I would expect nothing less from Penhaligons! <br />
<br />
8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1854980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1854980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's more masculine but I think I would wear it like on a day to day.
