<br />
 Fragrance Zodiac trio: VirgoGemini Capricorn</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1784586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1784586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1778998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1778998" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jamessoh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jamessoh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1778998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1778998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695741">Jamessoh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-09">03/09/23 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has a warm woody scent. Very pleasant. <br />
<br />
The longevity is pretty good as the smell of sandalwood remains even after 8h. The dry down reminds me of D&amp;G The One EDP. <br />
<br />
The bottle design is definitely one of the great selling points of this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1778998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1778998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771293" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ldg89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ldg89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63969.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Inimitable William Penhaligon"title="The Inimitable William Penhaligon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496161">ldg89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-28">02/28/23 06:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I added this perfume to my collection as this is the least disturbing wood I could find.<br />
<br />
For me, the deal breaker is what it smells on skin vs clothes. I have a warm skin, so typically any perfume would be loud and if there is a hint of wood, it would be more life fire, rather than a calm and relaxing smell. This perfume sits close to skin and reminds me something fresh-woody-amber with a very light hint of bergamot. I would possibly prefer it as an autumn scent and in a colder weather. It is not unique, but one of those that dont irritate me and are comfortable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1771293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1771293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1758583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1758583" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="raw.beast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516279.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="raw.beast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Franck-Boclet/Crime-49358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crime"title="Crime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1758583ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1758583" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516279">raw.beast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-12">02/12/23 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to test some frags from this House, but most of em have the notes Im avoiding. So picked up this one. And got those notes even here, oh damn. <br />
It has strong vanilla shades with certainly lavender, yes. And I can smell some sweaty notes (its a mix of jasmine and sandalwood, I guess) as in most of Amouage frags. Bergamot and cedar are barely noticeable at all. <br />
Its soft, warm, a little bit musky and total unisex. <br />
I have to pass :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1758583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1758583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1754794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/387877">aznbcool</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-08">02/08/23 04:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells just like amouage Meander without that carrot note. Such a gorgeous scent and garners tons of complements</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1754794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1754794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1753008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1753008" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DBlack47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DBlack47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2021-71326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2021"title="Dior Homme Sport 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1753008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1753008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641">DBlack47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-05">02/05/23 21:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>sample from Penhaligons after purchase:<br />
This fragrance is very warm, soft and inviting. Starts off with bergamot and Jasmine, with a moderate 15 mins dry-down to Earthy vetiver and sandalwood. I dont get any incense to my nose. The ambroxan helps the warmth and adds a layer of comfort to the fragrance. <br />
<br />
This fragrance is warm and creamy, inoffensive, but it reminds me of so many other fragrances. Lasts a decent amount of time (7hrs+ on skin), arms length projection and average sillage. <br />
<br />
Minimal compliment getter but should be good as an everyday cool-weather scent (not winter and not summer). I wont be purchasing a full bottle. <br />
<br />
Recommendation: meh <br />
Rating: 4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1753008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1753008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1730227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of the few bangers that made me want to buy a bottle right away. I wish it lasted longer, my only criticism</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1730227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1730227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1727651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1727651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shs111"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1351592.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shs111" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1727651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1727651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351592">shs111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-07">01/07/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just bought a small sample, having read various positive reviews. I'm not sure that this is for me. There's something in the initial scent that strikes me as odd, for some reason it even reminds me of summer camp -- maybe the dampness of the cabins or the wetness of the lake. I do like the way it's settling in, though, which reminds me that I shouldn't judge any EDP by its initial scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1727651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1727651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't get much citrus, just fresh, dry, and slightly smoky woods. This is very versatile and probably would not offend many. Drawback is that it is truly only a skin scent, and it smells like many other traditional colognes, so I would not spend the full price to purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The creaminess of the sandalwood is the same in the opening. After, it gets quite fresh. The bergamot really comes through on my skin, along with a background of vetiver and a slight bit of sandalwood. However I think the bergamot is what ruins this. The bergamot mixes with the vetiver and smells like damp forest leaves. Likeable but doesn't last long at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1663225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1663225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1655046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The ultimate scent, can be used daily and any occasion, a gentle, polite and sophisticated style !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1655046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1655046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1654162" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="markactor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="markactor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Bois-du-Portugal-3805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois du Portugal"title="Bois du Portugal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1654162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1654162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); Reminds me of a forrest after it rains.<br />
<br />
Definitely enjoyable for the fall time ( Spring as well )<br />
<br />
Unisex but leans more masculine in my opinion.<br />
<br />
Is it worth the price tag for this? Not for me. <br />
It's nothing spectacular, just enjoyable.<br />
Definitely worth a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1654040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1654040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536566">Modred</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-16">07/16/22 23:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>really smooth smelling almost like an office scent that is cashmere like. Some say it smells a bit like coconut don't really detect it here. The woody notes is really prominent where as it feels fresh and clean for me. Would definitely wear this for a casual day at the office. However the sillage isn't the best and i had to spray around 10-15 times depending on the weather for it to be picked up by others. I got a great deal for this but for retail this is overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1604589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1604589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1594327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495871">Cooling321</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-30">06/30/22 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell in love with this smell on paper at a department store, best thing I came by all day.<br />
So I got a few samples from the official site. <br />
Absolutely devastated to say that however amazing this stuff smells it just doesnt project off my skin or my girlfriends AT ALL and lasts no more than 3 hours before almost completely disappearing even from skin. Now this may not be a problem for some (people with more money than sense), but at the price this costs I think its absolutely disgusting, just not good enough, unacceptable. To get any performance youd have to treat this as a body spray and apply about 2ml all over and it would still probably performer poorly. Absolutely gutted but Ill keep looking for something similar that actually works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1594327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1594327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1566394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251713">Celestya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-18">05/18/22 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very nice sandalwood for men (but I can imagine to wear it!). Versatile, for all seasons, all ages and all profiles. Office compatible.<br />
8/10<br />
<br />
For my husband, in this brand: Sam (cardamon &amp; tobacco) &gt; William (sandalwood &amp; vetiver) &gt; Teddy (ambroxan &amp; incense) &gt; Georges (wood)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1566394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1566394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1542251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1542251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="interwebarachnid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="interwebarachnid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1542251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1542251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399507">interwebarachnid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-12">04/12/22 21:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A refreshing type of woody scent. Opens with a bloom of jasmine and bergamot which come to rest delicately atop a log of cedar. Makes me feel like Im sitting in front of an expertly carved wooden bowl, its undulating grain tamed by a lathe and polished attentively with some type of fancy oils. Within the bowl sits a handful of soft white petals, airy and wispy, coated in a fine misting of lime juice. The petals seem one with the bowl, each petit white sprig attached to the bowl with a delicate stem. Masterfully blended and a lovely scent for summer. Bergamot note is similar to the one in Fils de Dieu du riz et des agrumes Etat Libre d'Orange</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1542251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1542251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512562" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daisy_D"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daisy_D" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353">Daisy_D</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-26">02/26/22 12:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Matches with anyone wearing a light or bright coloured outfit. Fresh bergamot came after the clean and white floral scent.. A good perfume for warmer season</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1512562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1512562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1497186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1497186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr. Boston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr. Boston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit"title="Fahrenheit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1497186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1497186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290650">Mr. Boston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-03">02/03/22 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells beautiful. Sandlewood, Coconut, Vetiver. Similar to Amouage Meander. Lasts about 45 minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1497186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1497186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1495806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1495806" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="necrocrunk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451439"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1451439.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="necrocrunk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alkemia-Perfumes/Caveau-des-Innocents-39101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caveau des Innocents"title="Caveau des Innocents"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1495806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1495806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451439">necrocrunk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-01">02/01/22 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had this perfume/cologne on near all day, and it's still there, though you can only smell it when you get your nose close. It's hard to pin- it's very heavy with the 'cologne' scent, so if you don't like that then this may not be for you. I don't think I'd wear it personally, but I certainly wouldn't mind smelling it on someone else! The opening scent is INCREDIBLY strong as a warning, it was almost overwhelmingly musk/wood-y to a point that it wasn't pleasant, but only for a minute or two before it fully dried down into a quite nice sandalwood and cashmere vibe. I only wish the cedar was stronger honestly!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1495806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1495806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487120" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is for a gentleman that knows how to negotiate and get what he wants, he also has a luxury life and is a businessman. Its very professional plus a tad bit sexy. I love it. I follow my husband around more when he wears this.<br />
<br />
Performance- on my husbands skin 8hrs, on clothes 12hrs+</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1487120"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1487120#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1457142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1457142" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarkoPeeko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1359937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarkoPeeko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Memoir-Man-10145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Memoir Man"title="Memoir Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1457142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1457142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359937">MarkoPeeko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-04">12/04/21 04:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Morillas, yet again, has sculpted a fine frag. Problem is, the longevity is very average. For $400 AUD, this wont be getting purchased anytime soon. <br />
<br />
The opening is sublime. Citrus, wood, vetiver with a touch of smoke. The dry down is as lush. After 10-15m, Im picking up what smells like coconut. After a couple of hours, Im picking up a skin scent and the occasional waft. 3 hours in and its a soft skin scent. <br />
<br />
If they work on the longevity, Ill happily pour some dollars into a bottle. A shame. This is some fine juice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1457142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1457142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1432942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There might be something green making this fragrance more interesting than I've described. It's a nice fragrance for the bold vetiver lovers out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1432942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1432942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1427758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1427758" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="martin_jsgn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399460"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399460.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="martin_jsgn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1427758ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1427758" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399460">martin_jsgn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-13">10/13/21 22:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a handsome and dapper fragrance. I put this on if i want to feel calm and collected, a perfect image of a gentleman. The opening is incredibly inviting with a light creamy floral scents. No standout notes in the opening, everything is so well-blended. After a while it turns completely into a fabulously smooth and milky sandalwood - well done, stunning, elegant.<br />
<br />
Performance on the moderate side, and it gets volatile on me really, not sure why, maybe it's the weather, my body temp, or just my mood-induced chemicals. Sillage is "cozy" for like 3-4hrs, then it turns into a skin scent and stays there quite a while actually (till the ~8th hour).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1427758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1427758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1424489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1424489" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gurugaraklee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345901"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345901.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gurugaraklee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1424489ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1424489" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345901">gurugaraklee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-08">10/08/21 04:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like people before me have said, along with my sister when she smelled it, woodsy and coconutty.<br />
<br />
The smell becomes kinda creamy to my nose as the mid notes come alive too with the incense also quite distinct. It smells quite classy, quite gentlemanly which is exactly what I expected coming into Penhaligon's fragrances in addition to the fact that they have two royal warrants (three when the Duke of Edinburgh was alive.)<br />
<br />
It's a very intimate scent, it will not project very far at all but a very elegant scent when you catch a whiff so you'll be forgiven for going quite hard on the sprays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1424489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1424489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1423665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1423665" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1423665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1423665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-06">10/06/21 18:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WOODY + COCONUT<br />
<br />
At first I thought I was going a bit nuts (pardon the pun) - I was smelling coconut. And it's not listed as a note. (But I did just read a few reviews that confirmed my nose.)<br />
<br />
Overall a well blended, smooth, creamy fragrance that can get you thru daytime into evening during the autumn or winter. But you had best like coconuts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1423665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1423665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1402707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1402707" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arnoldolfactory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179907.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arnoldolfactory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-Man-15294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude Man"title="Interlude Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1402707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1402707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179907">Arnoldolfactory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-01">09/01/21 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impressions of this: a really nice sophisticated fragrance that doesn't scream, you could describe it as 'gentlemanly' - subtle dry vetiver interspersed with that classic creamy sandalwood grounded in cedar, with slight almost imperceptible citrus that quickly fades. <br />
<br />
There is nothing acerbic in this, it's incredibly well blended like most of Penhaligon's offerings, all notes combining seamlessly to form a beautiful aromatic whole. Could be an intriguing office scent or day to day fragrance, I believe you would have a right to over spray as it's projection lies within the realms of intimate.<br />
<br />
Overall nothing to dislike here other than the cost. If money is no object and subtle suave is the goal then go for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1402707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1402707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1399545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1399545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ravenna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360311"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360311.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ravenna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1399545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1399545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360311">ravenna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-27">08/27/21 04:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous, yummy aromatic sandalwood. It really does smell like Lutens' Jeux de Peau, but less edible/ lactonic. To me this is very unisex, but the way the vetiver lingers makes it lean a little masculine. Definitely suitable as a year-round signature scent thats more sophisticated but also dreamy. I'd love to smell this on a slightly older man or woman- not because it's mature but it needs that class to pull it off. The scent profile itself is pretty common, but it's elevated by the jasmine &amp; cedar in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1399545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1399545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1396892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1396892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lwsylvia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378125.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lwsylvia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Pure-Musc-For-Her-53441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Musc For Her"title="Pure Musc For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1396892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1396892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378125">lwsylvia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-22">08/22/21 08:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The top note is kind of spicy although there's no spice mentioned in the official note on perfume notes. Soon some gentle notes of vetiver and cedarwood prevail, which make the scent feel slightly moist yet clean. Later the citrus note also emerges to deliver a kind and open impression of the gentleman. The sandalwood in the bottom note smells much more distinguishable than the ambroxan to me, which is good as I noticed ambroxan smells slightly sensual to me. Overall a really nice perfume for men that are probably hitting their 30s. If a lady were to wear this I'd also find it a good match for some tough and stylish women.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1396892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1396892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1393762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1393762" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Safistus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Safistus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1393762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1393762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243849">Safistus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-17">08/17/21 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I recently tried this due to a sample I got and it simply reminds me of an image I saw in the past with some black spots bananas with the following text on them: "Not the best, but still good."<br />
This is what the fragrance is to me.<br />
It's nice, don't get me wrong, but the price simply doesn't justify the smell.<br />
It smells similar to Encre Noir a l'Extreme (at least for me), a bit sweeter because of the ambrox I guess, but overall, it's not a magnificent scent, especially when there are a lot more interesting to try.<br />
Again, not a bad fragrance, sillage and longevity is really good but, if you look at it entirely, it's not worth the money.<br />
After all, I guess we are not buying a fragrance for the bottle and the box, but for how it smells, right ?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="63969"comment_id="1393762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html?ccid=1393762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1385048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1385048" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="111ImNumber1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/237183"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="111ImNumber1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1385048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1385048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);
